page.title: 03"Yesterday" in Bradford
page.content: Yesterday was Thursday 16 May,1985 and it was a special day for me as it was my{birthday.}It was also special because we had a{holiday}from school as it was{Ascension Thursday,}a Holy Day of Obligation.I got up at 7 o'clock and had some cornflakes for my breakfast.Then I got washed, brushed my teeth and got dressed.I put on my best black dress, my new short white socks and my best black shoes.Then my mum took me to St.Mary's Church for {Mass.}After Mass my mum took me to my Nanna's while she got things ready for the{party.}She made sandwiches with potted meat,egg and cheese.We also had crisps,biscuits,red jelly,pickled onions,sausages on sticks,cheese on sticks and cola and cream soda to drink.My birthday cake was shaped like a number 8.After getting many presents and playing many games I went to bed.
